maiet.SCRIPT:
function NPC_117000:Init(NPCID) --[[ User Data 1: 왼촉수 누적 데미지 2: 오른촉수 누적 데미지 3: Pain누적 데미지 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 3);
local MaxHP = NPC_117000.MaxHP
NPC_117000.LimitForBeaten = MaxHP/5 -- beaten reaction
NPC_117000.LimitForLeftTentacle = MaxHP/2 -- left tentacle NPC_117000.LimitForRightTentacle = MaxHP/4 -- right tentacle
NPC_117000.TalIdPain1 = 211700015 -- long to_mode2 NPC_117000.TalIdPain1_1 = 211700016 -- short to_mode2 NPC_117000.TalIdPain2 = 211700017 -- long to_mode1 NPC_117000.TalIdPain2_1 = 211700018 -- short to_mode1 NPC_117000.TalIdPain3 = 211700019 -- short for hit reaction NPC_117000.TalIdPain4 = 211700020 -- long to_mode3 NPC_117000.TalIdPain4_1 = 211700021 -- short to_mode3
NPC_117000.TalIdVomit = 211700008 NPC_117000.TalIdBackAttack = 211700009 NPC_117000.TalIdFrontJump = 211700013
NPC_117000.BuffIdBadBreath = 40139 end
function NPC117000_BackAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local IsRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if Dist > 150 and Dist < 600 and IsRear then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_117000.TalIdBackAttack ) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdFrontJump ) return end ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdBackAttack ) end end
function NPC_117000:OnStartCleaning( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_117000.BuffIdBadBreath ) end
function NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) -- Acc damage local DmgAcc = 0 if PartsIdx == 1 or PartsIdx == 2 then DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( PartsIdx ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( PartsIdx, DmgAcc ) end
DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, DmgAcc )
--[[ GLog( "-- Process Acc Damage Root ( P:" .. PartsIdx .. ", D:" .. HitInfo.Damage .. ", 1:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) .. ", 2:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) .. ", 3:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) .. " ) --\n" ) --]]
if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_117000.TalIdVomit then -- no reaction while act vomit return end
-- Reaction if PartsIdx == 1 and -- ( not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) ) and -- If left tentacle is exist ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) > NPC_117000.LimitForLeftTentacle and -- If accumulated damage is enough ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then -- If current damage have enough motion-factor
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker )
-- Choose Pain Ani and mode change if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 2 ) then --GLog( "To mode3 ..\n" )
if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_117000.TalIdPain4 ) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain4_1 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain4 ) end
return end
--GLog( "To mode 1..\n" ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_117000.TalIdPain1 ) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain1_1 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain1 ) end
return end
if PartsIdx == 2 and ( not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 2 ) ) and ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) > NPC_117000.LimitForRightTentacle and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart( 2, HitInfo.Attacker )
if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then --GLog( "To mode3 ..\n" )
if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_117000.TalIdPain4 ) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain4_1 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain4 ) end return end
--GLog( "To mode 2..\n" ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_117000.TalIdPain2 ) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain2_1 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain2 ) end
return end
if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_117000.TalIdPain3 ) then return end
if ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) > NPC_117000.LimitForBeaten and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_117000.TalIdPain3 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, 0 ) return end end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_1_2(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_1(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_2(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_3(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_4(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_5(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_6(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_7(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_2_8(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_117000:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) NPC117000_ProcessAccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
